attributes.action: ensure that only tap water is served in the Houses of Parliament in the interest of reducing the carbon emissions caused by both the production and transportation of bottled water.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is growing resistance to the consumption of bottled water by the British public because of the amount of oil and water required for the poduction of plastic bottles.  Tap water in this country is safe and palatable, and MPs should be setting the standard by rejecting bottled water.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
